testcase.name: To validate that the URL will redirect to Universal Class home page.
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Browser....................................................passed When User enters URL in address bar.........................................passed Then User lands on Universal class Home Page................................passed

testcase.name: To validate that clicking on more option give a list of options like Sign in, subscribe, etc.
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User is able to view options like Sign in, subscribe , etc.............passed

testcase.name: To validate that clicking on close botton will close more option list.
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User click on close button to close the more option list...............passed

testcase.name: To validate that after clicking on sign in button Member Sign In window will appears.
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User click on Sign in button and Member sign in window will appears....passed

testcase.name: To validate that Sign in window have text box for Email and password respectively.
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User click on Sign in button and see two text box for email and password resp.passed

testcase.name: To validate that when user put a new email address the sign in button act as Sign up option .
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User click on Sign in button and Enter new email for sign up...........passed

testcase.name: To validate that the user should put correct email address and password during login
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User click on Sign in button and Enter email and password for login....passed

testcase.classname: Verification of Double check during Account creation
testcase.name: To validate that user should get a double verification process during the creation of account.
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User click on Sign in button and Enter credentials and face a double check..passed

testcase.name: To validate that the user should get Tip for wrong password.
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User click on Sign in button and Enter credentials and get a tip for wrong password..passed

testcase.name: To validate that after putting email and password sign in button will redirect to home page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User click on Sign in button and Enter credentials to land on home page.passed

testcase.name: To validate that Forgot password link will redirect to the page where user enter recovery email
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User click on forgot password link.....................................passed

testcase.name: To validate that the textbox accept the email address for recovery
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User click on email textbox for recovery...............................passed

testcase.classname: Verification of text in Search Bar
testcase.name: To validate that the user is able to put text in Search Bar
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User click on Search bar and enter text................................passed

testcase.classname: Verification of matched data in Search Bar.
testcase.name: To validate that the matched data in Search Bar give Course details
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User click on Search bar and enter matched data........................passed

testcase.classname: Verification of unmatched data in Search Bar.
testcase.name: To validate that the unmatched data in Search Bar give Error Message .
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User click on Search bar and enter unmatched data......................passed

testcase.name: To validate that the user is able to see Recent Search content.
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User click on Search bar...............................................passed

testcase.classname: Verification of Search Box with no Text
testcase.name: To validate that the user should land on Online Search Page when click enter without entering any text in search box.
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User click on Search bar and enter no text.............................passed

testcase.name: To validate that the pop up will show when click on course catalog.
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User click on course catalog button....................................passed

testcase.name: To validate that the my course button show opted courses.
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Universal Class Page.......................................passed When User clicks on more option button......................................passed Then User click on my class button..........................................passed
